Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-51744 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 24.0.9-17
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-51744 affecting package moby-engine for versions less than 24.0.9-17. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package moby-engine is earlier than 24.0.9-17, affected by CVE-2024-51744
